Method.name: Test
Method.Implementation:
if token '= ##class(Telegram.Bot.Settings).GetValue("token") return $$$NO
set deserializer = ##class(Serializer.JsonDeserializer).%New() set response = deserializer.Deserialize(%request.Content) set update = response.Convert("Telegram.DTO.Response.Update") set handler = ..GetHandlerFactory()
do ##class(Telegram.Bot.Api).ProcessUpdate(handler, update)
return $$$OK
